description:
Hoping to keep the momentum going in the wake of his latest victory, Yuma rises up to the challenge of a pint-sized duelist and his deck of monster machines!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Construction Site Duel! Destroy the Digger Deck!!
Koujigenba Duel! Juuki Deck o Uchiyabure!!
工事現場デュエル! 重機デッキを打ち破れ!!
